name: Guide of the Benefactors
description:
In the game, you take on the role of a child who loves role-playing games, and with your creativity and imagination you travel through the small village of Small Lake, to adventure and support others.

Assets Used:

Nature

Houses and Props

Characters were made in Mixamo

Game Song

Movement: WASD

Interaction: E

Inventory: TAB

Run: SHIFT

Overall: Jefesson Nunes
